title: Brag
lyrics:
6 ContributorsBrag Lyrics
So you think you got me, do you really
Think that you can stop me now?
(Think that you can stop me now?)
Write it down if you've been listening
Won't catch you stealing
But I doubt that you could find out how

I'm so sorry, I've been naughty
I've been keeping secrets
Something you'd know nothin' about
You won't cut it if you ain't' got it
But keep me in your recents
So I can relive all of your doubt

I couldn't be your savior if I wanted to
'Cause I know what takes to be your next best thing
If you think you got it goin' on, then tell the truth
'Cause I don't mean to brag
Come and catch me if you can

Oh my god, he's the man
I'll never see his face
Certainly won't take his place
(Well, not with the attitude)
Light my doubts up in flames
I'd love to be disgraced
But only if you're watchin' (Watchin' me)
You might also like
I'm so sorry, I've been naughty
I've been keeping secrets
Let me tell you who they're about
You won't cut it if you ain't' got it (No no)
But let me know you're listenin' (Ah)
So I can eat up all of your doubt

I couldn't be your savior if I wanted to
'Cause I know what takes to be your next best thing
If you think you got it goin' on, then tell the truth
'Cause I don't mean to brag
Come and catch me if you can
(I couldn't be your savior)
(Couldn't catch me if you, catch me if you wanted to)
(I couldn't be your savior)
'Cause I don't mean to brag
Come and catch me if you can

Who, who cares?
No one's there
You gonna give it to me?
You gotta give it to me (Oh-oh-oh-oh)
Life ain't fair
Aren't you scared?
I got the recipe
So try to copy me
I couldn't be your savior if I wanted to
I know what takes to be your next best thing
If you think you got it goin' on, then tell the truth
'Cause I don't mean to brag, I don't mean to brag
(Okay, maybe I do, but)
I couldn't be your savior if I wanted to (There ain't no way)
'Cause I know what takes to be your next best thing (There ain't no way)
If you think you got it goin' on, then tell the truth (T-t-tell it, tell it, tell it, ow!)
'Cause I don't mean to brag
Come and catch me if you can
I couldn't be your savior if I wanted to
'Cause nothin' I could do would put me next to you
I'd be lying if I said I always kept my cool
I don't mean to brag
Couldn't catch me if you, catch me if you wanted toEmbed
